description: Describing server-side stored product impressions, i.e. products that were returned from the backend (both api and web)

request_url.description: The url of the request asking for products

pagination_page.description: If pagination, this will describe the page

location.description: Describes what kind of page location or context the product was returned for

response_type.description: Describes if the products are returned for a WEB or API request

products.description: The product IDs for the returned products
